programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: A fearless detective Seok-do decides to hunt down Jang Chen, a cold-blooded boss of Heuksapa, an uprising criminal organization that turned Seoul’s Chinatown into a blood bath. Seok-do is an old-school detective with bravado who has been protecting the peace of his city with his strong fists and bold spirit. Together with team, Seok-do plans an ultimate crime sweep to take down Jang Chen’s gangs in one night.

programme.title: The Hot-Blooded
programme.desc: Four ex-taekwondo friends reunite to fight gangs and save their hometown from a dangerous deal.

programme.title: 12.12: The Day
programme.desc: In December 1979, Chun Doo-kwang leads a coup, opposed by soldier Lee Tae-shin, who resists military politics.

programme.title: OK! MADAM
programme.desc: Mi-Young runs a shop at a traditional market, where she makes and sells twisted bread sticks. Her husband Seok-Hwan works as a computer repairman. One day, Seok-Hwan wins a free trip to Hawaii. Mi-Young and Seok-Hwan will go on their first international trip together. When Mi-Young and Seok-Hwan get on the airplane to Hawaii, things don't go as expected. Terrorists, including Cheol-Seung, who chase after a secret agent, get on the same airplane. The passengers soon become hostages. Suddenly, Mi-Young and Seok-Hwan begin to rescue the passengers.

programme.title: Will You Be There
programme.desc: Soo-hyun saves a life of a little girl and receives ten mysterious pills from the girl’s grandfather.And the movie jumps thirty years back to when Soo-hyun was still a medical student and shows Soo-hyun and his then girlfriend Yeon-a who were very much in love with each other. With the pill's help, Soo-hyun travels back in time and meet his younger self. The movie illustrates in a moving way what it means to love and live with a choice one makes for love.

programme.title: The Exclusive
programme.desc: Mu-hyuk's false article on a serial killer makes him famous, but his cover-up traps him in a web of lies.

programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: Monster Cop Ma tracks drug dealers via app, exposing a brutal Korea-PH gambling ring and dark crimes.

programme.title: Mission Possible
programme.desc: To a private investigator Woo Su-han, who will take on any job if it pays the bill, a secret agent Yoo Da-hee comes along with $10,000 in cash. She proposes a joint operation to investigate an arms trafficking case. They attract more attention when they’re together and as the scope of this case increases by the minute, they leave behind evidence that put them on police’s target list...

programme.title: Mood of the day
programme.desc: On the train to Busan, Soo-jung meets Jae-hyun, self-proclaimed Agapemonite, embracing one-night stands.

programme.title: My Little Bride
programme.desc: Bo-eun must marry Sang-min due to a family promise. Things get complicated when he becomes her school teacher.

programme.title: Wet Dream
programme.desc: Jin-hee, scarred by loss and loneliness, finds healing and true love with a man who cherishes her selflessly.

programme.title: The Groin
programme.desc: During the Joseon times, three people who don't believe in love make a bet. Corrupted affection stories begin!

programme.title: The Concubine
programme.desc: Hwa-yeon, a concubine, faces palace danger after the king's death. A bloody fate awaits all within the palace.
